channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Queens Drive unswept litter everywhere, 8th October
item.description:
Litter strewn in the gutters of Queens Drive. Please add more resources to this road. Itâ€™s constantly dirty. Dog mess. Slippery pavements when it rains and litter everywhere. .

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queens Drive, Hackney, London

item.title: Dear Hackney Council can you please address this anti-social behaviour and criminal activity. Criminal Irish travellers operating at this traveller campsite. Fly tipping in and around surrounding areas cash in hand. Stealing motor vehicles. Cloning number plates on motor vehicles. Dumping vehicles in and around the area without no MOT, no road tax ,no insurance, no parking permit. Benefit fraud,Irish travellers claiming benefits pretending to live at addresses when they're not living there using addresses for fraudulent activity, using other people's false details aliasis. There are true homeless people out there who need a home.Irish travellers abused the system just for the sake of having a home when they don't use it the only use of this home is for fraud. Irish traveller claiming to live in a council flat but is living in traveller camp. Is Irish travellers know how to play the system. The government and local authority allowed us to happen., 8th October
item.description:
Criminals operating at this location. Antisocial behaviour.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homerton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wooden Palates and rubbish have been dumped here, 8th October
item.description:
This area is at the end of the slip road, Bearstead Terrace (BR3 1NU) in a recess at the end of the garages belonging to Bearstead Terrace and backing onto the railway lines. It is becoming a haven for foxes and rats which are affecting Marlborough Court which is next to this area (BR3 1NW) - this flytipping has been there for some time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bearsted Terrace, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
